Description.Text: Located in Kapaa, Pacific Fantasy Resort is a perfect starting point from which to explore Kauai Hawaii. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Facilities like Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, laundry service, concierge are readily available for you to enjoy. Non smoking rooms, air conditioning, balcony/terrace, fan, internet access â€“ wireless (charges apply) can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Kauai Hawaii, Pacific Fantasy Resort will make you feel instantly at home.
